headline: Trump endorses J.D. Vance for Ohio Senate, admits “This is not an easy endorsement for me”
author: A.M. Smith, Melissa Morales, You Are Going To Send Email To, Move Comment
sentences:
He was an incredible fighter for hard working Americans in the White House, he will be again, and I’ll fight for the America First Agenda in the Senate.”

I’m incredibly honored to have President Trump’s support.

Trump noted “Vance may have said some not so great things about me in the past, but he gets it now, and I have seen that in spades.”

Trump argued Vance is the best chance for Republican victory.
He was an incredible fighter for hard working Americans in the White House, he will be again, and I’ll fight for the America First Agenda in the Senate.

Vance (@JDVance1) April 15, 2022

Rep. Matt Gaetz wrote:

JD very much earned this endorsement by putting on a clinic in the Ohio Senate debates.
JD very much earned this endorsement by putting on a clinic in the Ohio Senate debates.
Vance replied by saying “I’m incredibly honored to have President Trump’s support.
President Trump wanted to see JD on that debate stage against Tim Ryan.
President Trump wanted to see JD on that debate stage against Tim Ryan.
Vance for Ohio Senate, admitting it was not an easy decision for him.
